artist-details.name: Bruno Mars
artist-details.bio: Bruno Mars, born Peter Gene Hernandez on October 8, 1985, in Honolulu, Hawaii, is a singer, songwriter, and record producer. Known for his pop, funk, R&B, and soul styles, Mars rose to fame with his debut album 'Doo-Wops & Hooligans' (2010) and hits like 'Just the Way You Are' and 'Grenade'. He has won several awards, including Grammys, and is renowned for his energetic performances.

artist-details.name: Adele
artist-details.bio: Adele Laurie Blue Adkins, born on May 5, 1988, in Tottenham, London, is a British singer and songwriter. Known for her powerful voice and emotional lyrics, Adele gained global recognition with her debut album '19' and subsequently with '21', '25', and '30'. She has won multiple Grammys and an Oscar.

artist-details.name: Ed Sheeran
artist-details.bio: Edward Christopher Sheeran, born February 17, 1991, in Halifax, England, is a singer, songwriter, and record producer. Sheeran gained fame with his debut album '+', followed by 'x', 'รท', and '='. Known for his ballads and introspective lyrics, he is one of the best-selling music artists in the world.

artist-details.name: Taylor Swift
artist-details.bio: Taylor Alison Swift, born December 13, 1989, in Reading, Pennsylvania, is an American singer and songwriter. She began her career in country music before transitioning to pop. Her albums include 'Fearless', '1989', 'Reputation', and 'Lover'. Swift is known for her personal lyrics and engagement with her fans.

artist-details.name: The Weeknd
artist-details.bio: Abel Makkonen Tesfaye, known professionally as The Weeknd, is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and record producer. He gained fame with his album 'Starboy' and hits like 'Blinding Lights' and 'Can't Feel My Face'. The Weeknd is known for his distinctive voice and innovative style.

artist-details.name: Lady Gaga
artist-details.bio: Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta, known professionally as Lady Gaga, is an American singer, songwriter, and actress. She gained fame with her debut album 'The Fame', and worldwide success with hits like 'Poker Face' and 'Bad Romance'. Lady Gaga is known for her powerful voice and theatrical performances.

artist-details.name: Dua Lipa
artist-details.bio: Dua Lipa, born August 22, 1995, in London, is a British singer and songwriter. She gained prominence with her debut self-titled album and the global hit 'New Rules'. Known for her powerful voice and modern style, Dua Lipa is one of the most influential artists of the present day.

artist-details.name: Khalid
artist-details.bio: Khalid Donnel Robinson, known as Khalid, was born on October 11, 1998, in Fort Stewart, Georgia. He gained prominence with his debut album 'American Teen', and is known for his songs that blend R&B, pop, and hip-hop.
